feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Error in Projection CDS View E:SDDL_PARSER_MSG:542 PROVIDER CONTRACT 785
entry.content:
I have developed Root view and on top of which I want to define Projection View, But I encouter error as  E:SDDL_PARSER_MSG:542 PROVIDER CONTRACT 785 , help me to fix this issue. Iam on S4 2020.

@EndUserText.label: 'Projection View for Holiday Block'

@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED

@Metadata.allowExtensions: true

@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true

@Search.searchable: true

define root view entity ZHLD_CUST_BLOCK_C

provider contract transactional_query

as projection on ZHOLIDAY_BLOCK_ROOT

{

key Customer,

key Salorg,

key DistChn,

key Div,

CustomerName1,

CustomerName2,

CustDelBlock,

Text,

StartDate,

EndDate

}

entry.title: Changing Post Processing in DMEE
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I'm currently working on adapting DMEE format to align with the new ISO 20022 requirements, specifically for the CGI_XML_CT_V9 format. However, I'm encountering a blocking issue related to post processing of empty XML elements in the DMEE tree.

We are implementing the ISO pain 001.001.09 XML format, and during validation, the generated XML file fails.

I attempted to modify the Post Processing settings in the DMEE tree to adjust how empty elements are handled. The goal is to completely remove empty elements.

I followed these instructions: 3480644 - DMEE/DMEEX: XML Empty Element Processing

However, here's the issue:

  • I change the setting, save it, and activate the DMEE tree.

  • But every time I reopen the DMEE tree, the setting reverts back to “DO NOT REMOVE” – the change doesn't persist.

This means my XML output is still invalid, and I cannot move forward with the bank's required format.

Has anyone experienced this rollback issue in the DMEE post processing settings?

 Any guidance would be greatly appreciated. 

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: What happened with Tagging Framework in ABAP?
entry.content:
I've randomly found a mention of Tagging Framework in ABAP Help for 7.4 via Google here. There is very little information about it, just the links to APIs and ODATA. 

The ODATA link is a list of classes that look like classic code-based SEGW implementation. API link is a list of interfaces. Just minimal information about them, no context or examples. However, none of these classes or interfaces exist in our test S/4HANA 2020 system. The SPRO path doesn't exist either.

When searching for "tagging framework" on SAP Help site, I only found the same information listed under ABAP Platform, which should be current. But it's just the same exact text. 

There are no prerequisites listed for this, so I'd assume it should just be included with ABAP platform. But it clearly isn't. Does anyone know what's the deal with this? Is there a prerequisite or an extra solution to purchase?

If you have CL_TFW_ODATA_TAG_DPC or IF_TFW_TAG in your system, where do they belong?

Really curious about this mystery. Thanks!

entry.title: Inquiry About Converting Binary Excel Data to PDF in Background Job
entry.content:
Hi.

I currently have an Excel file converted into binary form. I would like to perform the conversion of this binary data into a PDF file using a background job.

I am aware that OLE objects cannot be used in a background job.

Nevertheless, I would like to inquire if there are any possible methods to achieve this.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,

Sungmin,

entry.title: When I called BAPI_SALESORDER_CHANGE, "Update was canceled" received from author "CHENG_MR".
entry.content:
When I called BAPI_SALESORDER_CHANGE, the internal table RETURN did not contain any error messages. However, immediately after execution, a popup appeared saying:

"Express document 'Update was canceled' received from author 'CHENG_MR'"

Why did this happen? Below is the code I wrote.

DATA : ls_partner          TYPE bapiparnr,
       lt_return           TYPE TABLE OF bapiret2,
       Lt_PARTNER          TYPE TABLE OF bapiparnr,
       ls_partnerchanges   TYPE  bapiparnrc,
       Lt_PARTNERCHANGES   TYPE TABLE OF bapiparnrc,
       ls_partneraddresses TYPE  bapiaddr1,
       lv_order_header_inx TYPE  bapisdh1x,
       Lt_PARTNERADDRESSES TYPE TABLE OF bapiaddr1.

DATA: lv_adrnr TYPE kna1-adrnr.

SELECT SINGLE adrnr INTO lv_adrnr
  FROM kna1
  WHERE kunnr = '0000001100'.


CLEAR:lt_return,lt_partner.
lv_order_header_inx-updateflag = 'U'.

ls_partner-partn_role  = 'AG'.

ls_partner-partn_numb  = '0000001100'.
ls_partner-country     = 'CN'.
ls_partner-name        = 'laogao'.
ls_partner-postl_code = '112222'.
ls_partner-city       = 'chang'.
ls_partner-street      = '222222'.
ls_partner-telephone   = '1777777777'.
APPEND ls_partner TO lt_partner.
CLEAR:ls_partner.


ls_partnerchanges-updateflag = 'U'.
ls_partnerchanges-document   = '1100000397'.
ls_partnerchanges-itm_number = '000000'.
ls_partnerchanges-partn_role = 'AG'.
ls_partnerchanges-p_numb_old = '0000001100'.
ls_partnerchanges-p_numb_new = '0000001100'.
*ls_partnerchanges-addr_link  = lv_adrnr.
APPEND ls_partnerchanges TO lt_partnerchanges.
CLEAR ls_partnerchanges.

ls_partneraddresses-country = 'CN'.
*ls_partneraddresses-addr_no = lv_adrnr.
ls_partneraddresses-name    = 'ruirui'.
ls_partneraddresses-tel1_numbr  = '16666666666'.
ls_partneraddresses-street  = 'Street'.
ls_partneraddresses-postl_cod2  = '010704'.
APPEND ls_partneraddresses TO lt_partneraddresses.
CLEAR ls_partneraddresses.

CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_SALESORDER_CHANGE'
  EXPORTING
    salesdocument    = '1100000397'
    order_header_inx = lv_order_header_inx
  TABLES
    return           = lt_return
    partners         = lt_partner
    partnerchanges   = lt_partnerchanges
    partneraddresses = lt_partneraddresses.

CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT'
  EXPORTING
    wait = 'X'.


REFRESH:lt_partner,lt_partnerchanges.

entry.title: How to prevent deletion of specific entry in Event 03 (Table Maintenance) when choose multiple rows
entry.content:
Hi experts, I am using Event 03: Before Deleting the Data for my table ZSAP03_EMAIL Now I write this FORM to prevent user from deleting user with USER_ID = DEV-145. When I delete a line with DEV-145 the system works correctly, but when I select multiple lines, including DEV-145 the system deletes DEV-145 as well. Please give me detailed solutions

 

FORM on_delete.
FIELD-SYMBOLS: <fs_user_id> TYPE any.

ASSIGN COMPONENT 'USER_ID' OF STRUCTURE <vim_total_struc> TO <fs_user_id>.

IF sy-subrc = 0 AND <fs_user_id> = 'DEV-145'.

MESSAGE 'Default row DEV-145 cannot be deleted!' TYPE 'E'.
ENDIF.
ENDFORM.

please help 

Regards

entry.title: Functionality to attach pdf to freight order to see the same in bobt.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am working on a requirement where I need to attach a PDF document (e.g., checklist) to a Freight Order (TOR) using BOPF in SAP TM.

The context is as follows:

  • I am using the TOR BO (/SCMTMS/TOR)
  • The structure involves ATTACHMENTFOLDER → DOCUMENT → FILE_CONTENT
  • The PDF content is available as a Base64 string, which I decode into an XSTRING
  • I am implementing this inside a custom OData service method

    Despite creating the necessary BOPF modification entries, I am encountering a short dump with the exception /BOBF/CX_FRW_FATAL at the modify() call. Attaching dump file as well.

    Could someone please provide:

    1. A working example or complete ABAP logic to create the attachment folder, document, and file content
    2. Any prerequisites or customizing required for this to work (e.g., attachment schema, storage category, etc.)
    3. Guidance on how to correctly set associations and parent/child relationships in the modification table

      Any insights or suggestions would be highly appreciated.

      Thank you in advance.

entry.title: Unable to see the log during Invoice cancellation
entry.content:
Hi,

We have implemented a custom logic under the BADI (SD_BIL_FLEX_CANCELLATION ) for Invoice cancellation based on the staus of IRN,

Scenario is we have generated the IRN and we are cancelling the invoice system wil pass Error Message "Invoice cannot be cancelled please cancel the IRN first, but when we are checking durig VF11 we are getting the message no billing document was generated plese chck the log, however when we check the log we are getting the blank screen.

the same thing we tried during Runtime during debugging we were able to see the Message Text "Invoice cannot be cancelled please cancel the IRN first" 

Attahced screenshot for your reference, community membrs need you support.

Regards

Sandeep Patel

entry.title: Possibility for Mass Production Order Confirmation in Foreground from template in SAP Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement, where users perform "Mass Confirmation of production order's" through Excel template. Also, the confirmation screen - CO11N have certain validations (using Badi) in place for the order to be confirmed.

Each order is confirmed in foreground, allowing users to manipulate "Goods movement data - yield Qty, posting date, Storage location, Execution date, Component Qty" to be within validations placed. This is possible in ECC.

Requirement in Public cloud system:

1) User should be able to upload list of Production orders with other info through Template.

2) User should perform confirmation in the foreground with data picked from template and also allowing to change on screen confirmation data.

Has anyone achieved or any possible leads for the same to be replicated in SAP Public Cloud environment?

Thankyou.

entry.title: FF-762- Condition type XXXX tax code XX does not exist - BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT_POST
entry.content:
Hello all,

I encountered an error while posting the document with BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT_POST, whereas manual posting through FB60 was successful with the same tax code. The BAPI validates the condition type and tax code in the Tax Classification table (A003 or A053), but we have maintained it in A651. Kindly suggest how I can achieve this.

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Dear SAP BTP Trial Support Team,
entry.content:
Dear SAP BTP Trial Support Team/ ABAP TEAM,

I’m currently using the SAP BTP ABAP Environment trial (User ID: GE202076), and I’m facing persistent activation issues with a CDS view.

I’ve followed all RAP and CDS conventions using `define root view entity` based on the recommended replacement entity `I_BUSINESSUSERBASIC`.

However, every attempt to activate the CDS fails with errors like:

- The column BUSINESSUSER is unknown

- The column EMAILADDRESS is unknown

- The column ISLOCKED is unknown

- The column LOGONNAME is unknown

I’ve also tried switching to fields like `firstname`, `lastname`, `emailaddress`, and `businesspartner`, but the activation consistently fails—even in newly created CDS views with correct templates and package setup.

I’ve followed every clean step using Eclipse ADT, project `TDI_EN`, and package `ZGE202076A`, and validated field names via `Ctrl + Space` in the Outline view.

Could you please help me:

  1. Confirm the available fields in `I_BUSINESSUSERBASIC` in my trial tenant 
  2. Identify whether this is a metadata replication/cache issue 
  3. Suggest if another CDS (like `I_EMPLOYEESIMPLE` or similar) should be used instead

Looking forward to your guidance.

Thanks

Best regards, 

**Madhulatha Pelluri**

entry.title: Update Default parameters in Su01 while creating user ID
entry.content:
Hi All,

Greetings..

I tried below logic in BADI but its not updating

    DATA : ls_param TYPE suid_st_node_parameter,
           It_param TYPE TABLE OF suid_st_node_parameter.


    ls_param-parid = 'EVO'.
    ls_param-parva = '03'.


    APPEND ls_param TO it_PARAM.

    CALL METHOD iv_idref->set_parameters
      EXPORTING
        it_parameters = it_param.

    COMMIT WORK.

 

can someone suggest how to resolve this issue ?

entry.title: BADI Recommendation for Vendor Balance Validation in FB65 in public cloud
entry.content:
Dear Team,

We have a business requirement where users should be allowed to post an FB65 transaction (Create Incoming Invoice) only if the vendor has a NIL or debit balance (that is, the vendor balance must be greater than or equal to zero).

Could you please advise which BADI can be used to implement this validation

Thanks & Regards

Dedipya

entry.title: mass upload program for test cases in solution manager
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Is it possible to create a mass upload program to create and update test plan and test cases in solution manager ?

I am currently exploring class CL_SMT_API_TPLN_FACTORY which can be used for creation of test plan but it have very limited access to updates/create test cases in existing plan also it is not possible to get the details of test case in order to update it.

Thanks

entry.title: CS_BOM_EXPL_MAT_V2 - Z Position
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

I am using CS_BOM_EXPL_MAT_V2 with following parameters:
CALL FUNCTION 'CS_BOM_EXPL_MAT_V2'
    EXPORTING
      capid                 = lv_capid
      datuv                 = sy-datum
      mehrs                 = 'X'
      mtnrv                 = is_header_dialog-matnr
      werks                 = is_header_dialog-werks
      stlal                 = is_header_dialog-stlal
      stlan                 = is_header_dialog-stlan
      mdmps                 = 'X'
    TABLES
      stb                   = lt_stpo
      matcat                = lt_matcat
    EXCEPTIONS
      alt_not_found         = 1


I have a material which is marked with - " Indicator: Assembly available".
I also need the multilevel material of the assemblies but not the ones which are marked as Z  Position Type (stpo-postp)
How can I exclude these Z assemblies?

entry.title: Custom field in structure BAPIDFKKZP through BAPI_CTRACPAYMINC_APPEND for table DFKKZP
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,
there is a business requirement to create custom fields in table DFKKZP, which will be mapped with structure BAPIDFKKZP and will be further used in BAPI_CTRACPAYMINC_APPEND to post items in a payment lot. Payment items in a lot are being read and added from a file, so now manual intervention.
Now the problem is, the BAPI does not have EXTENSIONIN and EXTENSIONOUT parameters in it and implicit enhancement being the last option so that it does not impact us on upgrades. I would like to hear your suggestions to solve this problem.

Regards
Gaurav.

entry.title: (Custom) Idoc: issue when changing data type of a field
entry.content:
Hello everyone, 

I've searched the forum, and I've found this old post:

https://community.sap.com/t5/application-development-and-automation-discussions/changing-data-type-in-a-customised-idoc/m-p/2138493/thread-id/450151 

I also need to change the data type of the field,  in a segment of a custom idoc.

The new field format is 18 char, while the old one is 2 char.

I did simply what they suggested in that post; however, now old idocs (of the same message type) are not displayed correctly in transaction WE02 - which seems unable to interpret the old content according to the new structure. As I increased the dimension of the field (I did not reduce it), I would expect that the old content of that field can be put in the new format with no issues..

Can anyone help me?

Thanks in advance
